programme.title: As últimas notícias sobre testes científicos realizados na escola de South Park revelam que alguns dos meninos estão viciados em sexo.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle, Cartman Kenny e Stan se juntam com os cidadãos de South Park e lutam bravamente contra a dominação de Nova Jersey em uma onda que está afetando todo o país
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle está "intestinalmente" envolvido no desenvolvimento de um novo produto revolucionário que será lançado pela Apple chamado HumancentiPad.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle participa do mais recente empreendimento de Cartman, a Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Associação Atlética de Bebês do Crack

programme.title: Os garotos estão próximos de descobrir a verdade sobre o primeiro Dia de Ação de Graças da história dos Estados Unidos.
programme.desc: South Park
programme.sub-title: Dia de Ação de Graças no History Channel

programme.title: Uma nova garota chega na escola e todo mundo quer saber por quem ela tem uma queda, e Cartman está especialmente animado.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Ike chega à puberdade, mas Kyle se preocupa com o fato de que ele e seu irmão menor estão se distanciando. Dessa forma, Kyle o leva a uma apresentação ao vivo de seu programa de TV favorito.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Cartman facilita a paz mundial com sua última brincadeira, o que leva os líderes religiosos a South Park para testemunhar o acontecimento de uma profecia bíblica.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Kyle não entende por que Ike e seus amigos querem ver as pessoas comentar sobre coisas acontecendo, em vez de experimentá-la por si mesmos. Enquanto isso, Randy tem que apresentar ao vivo para fazer algum dinheiro.
programme.desc: South Park

programme.title: Viva Django!, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: Travado e cheio de chumbo, cortesia de seu ex-amigo, o político inescrupuloso e amante do dinheiro David Barry, Django se vê vagando de uma cidade empoeirada para outra trabalhando como carrasco.

programme.title: Os Abutres Têm Fome, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: Nesta aventura desenfreada e anárquica que se desenrola no México do século XIX, o mercenário americano Hogan salva a freira Sara dos seus pretensos molestadores.

programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: Indômita Disputa, (1979, Western)
programme.desc: Pike, Martin Sheen, é um jovem forasteiro da cidade que se vê preso e perdido em meio ao deserto oeste selvagem quando o seu amigo e caçador de peles morre.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Bravura Indômita, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Uma garota, Mattie Ross, contrata por 100 dólares um xerife caolho e beberrão, Rooster Cogburn, para que capture o assassino de seu pai.

programme.title: Uma Pistola para Ringo, (1965, Western)
programme.desc: Após assaltar o banco local, uma gangue liderada pelo cruel Sancho se refugia em uma fazenda tomando como reféns seus habitantes.

programme.title: Se Encontrar Sartana, Reze pela sua Morte, (1968, Western)
programme.desc: O lendário herói Sartana é chamado para investigar uma série de roubos e assassinatos, que levam a consequências surpreendentes.

programme.title: Jake Grandão, (2012, Western)
programme.desc: Um velho pecuarista do Texas, que já viveu o ponto alto da vida, entra em ação quando bandidos sequestram seu neto e ferem seu filho.

programme.title: Rumo ao Fim do Mundo, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Em meio a uma catástrofe biológica que ameaça destruir a raça humana, as histórias de três casais se cruzam quando eles são forçados a tomar decisões difíceis que definirão seu futuro.

programme.title: Refúgio do Silêncio, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Funcionários de uma empresa vão a um refúgio nas montanhas e descobrem o horror por trás do lugar.

programme.title: O Semideus, (2021, Horror)
programme.desc: Um casal viaja para uma cabana isolada e descobrem a história aterrorizante do local. Não demora até que tenham que enfrentar momentos de puro horror na imensa floresta que os cerca.

programme.title: Até o Fim da Noite, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Jimmy Hill é um presidiário que recebe uma proposta irrecusável. Se conseguir pagar a dívida de um velho conhecido, poderá finalmente sair da prisão.

programme.title: Interligados, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Um homem, que se culpa pela morte da sua filha única, retorna à cidade onde o fatídico acidente ocorreu. Lá, ele conhece uma bela e misteriosa mulher. Ambos sentem-se atraídos um pelo outro, mas ela também carrega um passado sombrio.

programme.title: Meteoro: O Fim dos Tempos, (2023, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Quando um meteoro de enorme proporção ameaça destruir a Terra, um grupo de cientistas corre contra o tempo para encontrar uma maneira de salvar a humanidade da extinção.

programme.title: Teia De Crimes, (2021, Drama)
programme.desc: O xerife Alden Rockwell está se preparando para uma aposentadoria indesejada até que seu velho amigo de guerra e xerife vizinho, Clint, é misteriosamente baleado. Imediatamente a esposa de Clint pressiona Alden para investigar o tiroteio.

programme.title: Acima Da Lei, (2018, Thriller)
programme.desc: Uma mulher pede a seu ex-marido, um advogado renomado, que defenda seu irmão criminoso, acusado de matar um promotor público.

programme.title: Assassinos de Aluguel, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Inspirado na história real de um escândalo que envolveu presidiários sendo liberados por um dia para trabalharem como assassinos de aluguel para políticos corruptos.

programme.title: Jogo da Sobrevivência, (2014, Thriller)
programme.desc: Baseado em uma história real. Reagan, uma estrela do atletismo, é sequestrada por uma dupla de sociopatas depois que seu carro quebra em uma estrada deserta para a liberdade.

programme.title: Forças do Mal, (2007, Horror)
programme.desc: Cinco histórias macabras giram em torno de um controle remoto, um rádio estranho, uma garota de programa assassina (Camille Lacey), um noivado e um fantasma.

programme.title: Necrotério, (2006, Zombies)
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: Tubarões de Gelo, (2016, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Uma nova raça de tubarões vorazes e agressivos racha o fundo do oceano congelado de uma estação de pesquisa do Ártico, devorando todos os que caem.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubarão de 3 Cabeças, (2015, Horror)
programme.desc: A maior máquina de matar do mundo é três vezes mais mortal quando um tubarão mutante ameaça um navio de cruzeiro. Os passageiros lutam contra o predador mortal usando tudo que podem encontrar.

programme.title: Paciente Zero, (2020, Thriller)
programme.desc: Quando os testes médicos são levados ao limite, os experimentos mais extremos terminam na ilha de St. Leonards, no Atlântico Norte - uma prisão destinada a alguns dos criminosos mais violentos do mundo.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo é tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrâneo na Flórida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenças entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: O Palhaço, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Depois de comprar uma boneca, a vida de Lane piora quando amigos próximos e familiares começam a desaparecer.

programme.title: V/H/S, (2012, Horror)
programme.desc: Um grupo de criminosos é contratado para recuperar uma fita de vídeo. À medida que eles buscam em pilhas de fitas VHS o vídeo certo, eles se deparam com um número aparentemente interminável de vídeos assustadores, cada um mais estranho que o último.

programme.title: O Monstro dentro de você, (2016, Thriller)
programme.desc: Depois de uma noite de festa Lou se levanta com sintomas desagradáveis que indicam que algo está errado. Seu corpo muda pouco a pouco de uma maneira estranha, há manchas em sua pele e ele tem visões que a impedem de distinguir a realidade da ficção.

programme.title: Inuyasha é afastado de seus amigos quando é enganado por informações falsas de que Kikyo ainda está viva. Enquanto isso, Agome e os outros estão em uma certa cidade do castelo e são capturados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Escuridão do Coração de Agome

programme.title: O bebê de Narak guia Agome para um templo abandonado. Ele ordena que Kagura coloque um fragmento corrompido da Jóia nela, mas Agome recupera a consciência.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Na Era Antiga, Narak encontra um novo youkai para procurar os fragmentos da Jóia. Enquanto isso, Agome retorna aos dias atuais e descobre que sua escola está no meio da preparação para um festival cultural.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: No dia do festival cultural, os youkais que Agome trouxe do Japão feudal são revividos. Eles devoram a comida que Yuka e os outros fizeram.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Os Youkais Invadem o Festival Cultural

programme.title: Um youkai é revivido e começa a roubar garotas e um jovem procura ajuda de Kaede. Inuyasha tem que derrotar esse novo youkai.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Cinco irmãos raposas youkais acreditam que Shippo é um herói. Eles se tornam seus discípulos para aprender sua técnica especial, que na verdade é do Inuyasha.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e seu grupo se encontram com Shinosuke, que está procurando por sua noiva. Eles são agrupados em uma vila só de mulheres e são separados.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Em uma aldeia onde vivem apenas mulheres, um youkai que foi selado em um pergaminho, é revivido.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Confissão Mais Perigosa de Mirok

programme.title: Uma mulher misteriosa aparece diante de Sesshomaru. Sara foi trazida de volta à vida e roubou a Tessaiga de Inuyasha e transformou Mirok e Sango em estátuas.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 1

programme.title: Sara pede a Sesshomaru que a destrua junto com o espírito, ele obedece e usa a Tessaiga para destruir Sara junto com o espírito.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Mulher que Amou Sesshomaru: Parte 2

programme.title: Mushin, a pessoa que criou Mirok, vai morrer. Eles perguntam a Mushin o que ele quer para que eles possam lhe dar um último presente.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Último Banquete do Mestre Mirok

programme.title: Um youkai invisível que rouba tesouros surgiu. Uma velha que não conseguiu derrotá-lo pede ajuda a Inuyasha e o grupo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Um ancestral de Hojo está em uma jornada para oferecer a herança da família Hojo, uma espada demoníaca. Inuyasha e seu grupo o acompanham.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Nome do Ancestral é Agome

programme.title: A lâmina de Ken traz desastre e Akitoki e Inuyasha viajam para o santuário para selar os poderes demoníacos da lâmina.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Sobrevivente em uma Terra Infestada por Youkais

programme.title: Hoshiyomi usa a lâmina Ken para roubar os poderes demoníacos da Tessaiga. Ele captura Agome e diz a Inuyasha para ir ao santuário dos deuses do vento e do trovão.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Grande Duelo na Cascata Shoun

programme.title: Tsukiyomi, que deveria estar morto, possui Agome e aparece diante de Hoshiyomi.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O bebê de Narak está trazendo sacerdotes virtuosos perto da morte e perscrutando suas mentes. Ele está tentando investigar o local que liga os mundos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: O bebê de Narak foi dividido em dois. Metade volta à vida na forma de uma criança vestida de branco.

programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Viagem em Busca do Pai

programme.title: O local entre este mundo e o próximo, onde está o fragmento da Jóia, é o cemitério do pai de Inuyasha .
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Inuyasha e o grupo chegam na terra do fogo. Eles descobrem um portal gigante dentro de uma caverna nas montanhas.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Quando a passagem na Terra do Fogo se abriu, Agome sentiu a presença do fragmento da Jóia.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: Abi, A Incontrolável Manipuladora de Aves

programme.title: Quando Kaede ainda era criança, sua irmã mais velha Kikyo ficou responsável por proteger a Jóia de youkais.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: A Trágica Canção de Amor do Destino: Parte 1

programme.title: Kikyou passou dias extenuantes lutando contra youkais, até que um dia, um meio-youkai chamado Inuyasha apareceu.

programme.title: Para derrotar Narak, Kagura procura pelo Sesshomaru.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Agome e os outros sentem a presença de Kikyo e de sua de sua flecha purificadora.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A outra metade de Hakudoshi, o bebê de Narak, está escondida em um castelo por Kanna.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A princesa Abi e Tekkei sentem que as pessoas continuam interferindo desde que se envolveram com Narak.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: A princesa Abi não gosta de Narak e ataca um castelo que pertencente a humanos envolvidos com ele.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Kikyo se reencontra com Inuyasha e ela o aconselha a não levar Agome com ele, porque Narak está querendo usá-la.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Narak corta a cabeça de Tekkei e a usa para abrir o rio de sangue que liga os mundos.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR
programme.sub-title: O Youkai que Protege o Fragmento

programme.title: Kagura leva Sesshomaru ao Reino do Fogo e ele usa a Tenseiga para afastar Gozu e Mezu.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Narak roubou o último fragmento de Hosenki. Hosenki diz a Inuyasha para matá-lo para fortalecer a Tessaiga.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Hakudoshi lança um enxame de ratos youkais de nicho para atrair Kikyo.
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR

programme.title: Com as almas trocadas entre si, Mista e os outros têm que dar um jeito de recuperar a flecha antes que Diavolo fique com ela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Quando Requiem provoca mutação nas entidades ao seu redor, Giorno conclui que a alma de Diavolo deve estar possuindo um dos membros de sua equipe.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Apesar de seus esforços, a flecha cai nas mãos de Diavolo. Mas antes que o chefe possa perfurar seu próprio Stand com ela, Bucciarati intervém.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Stand de Giorno evolui para Golden Wind Requiem. Diavolo tenta anular seus ataques, mas uma nova e terrível realidade aguarda o chefe da máfia.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Ao investigar o suposto suicídio da filha do florista, Mista se depara com um usuário de Stand chamado Scolippi.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Após a morte de seu pai, Dio Brando entra para uma família aristocrática e jura para si mesmo que vai deixar o herdeiro deles, Jonathan “JoJo” Joestar, sem nada.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo conhece um líder de gangue chamado Speedwagon quando vai a Londres investigar o envenenamento de seu pai.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo enfrenta Dio após dar o antídoto ao pai. Durante a batalha, Dio decide usar a máscara de pedra.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo reencontra seu primeiro amor, Erina. Um homem chamado Will A. Zeppeli demonstra ter um estranho poder e diz que JoJo precisa destruir a máscara de pedra.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e seus companheiros são emboscados por Dio e uma horda de zumbis depois de serem atraídos até um cemitério por um garoto chamado Poco.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O lendário cavaleiro Blueford ressuscita e confia sua espada a JoJo. Tarkus ataca JoJo com força avassaladora.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Zeppeli ataca Tarkus, mesmo sabendo de seu destino terrível. Em um último ato de coragem, ele usa as forças que lhe restam para repassar seus poderes ao sucessor, JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo resgata a irmã de Poco. Dire, um amigo de Zeppeli, bate de frente com Dio. Com a espada de Blueford nas mãos, JoJo volta a enfrentar Dio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: JoJo e Erina embarcam em um cruzeiro para a lua de mel. Mas, para o espanto de JoJo, uma pessoa ligada a Dio aparece a bordo do navio.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1938. Em uma ruína mexicana, diversas máscaras de pedra são descobertas. Na cidade de Nova York, um jovem chamado Smokey recebe a ajuda de Joseph, o neto de JoJo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph enfrenta Straizo, que virou vampiro após trair seu amigo Speedwagon. Terminada a batalha, Straizo avisa sobre o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph é atacado por um dos homens de Stroheim na chegada ao México. Stroheim tenta despertar Santviento, o Homem do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa seu poder para tentar fugir de Santviento. Quando isso não dá certo, ele tenta expor seu inimigo à luz do sol para se salvar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Speedwagon conhecem Caesar, neto de Zeppeli, quando chegam a Roma após a descoberta de que existem outros Homens do Pilar.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O Homem do Pilar Wamuu fere Caesar Zeppeli durante uma luta feroz. Joseph revela a nova técnica que desenvolveu em segredo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Caesar leva Joseph até Veneza para conhecer sua mentora Lisa Lisa, que começa a treiná-lo com rigor para aprender a controlar seus poderes.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Lisa Lisa diz a Joseph que ele precisa da pedra chamada Super Aja para destruir os Homens do Pilar. Joseph e Caesar enfrentam outros mestres.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph e Caesar combinam seus poderes e enfrentam o Homem do Pilar que tomou o corpo de Suzi Q para roubar a Pedra Vermelha de Aja.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Stroheim luta com Kars em seu novo corpo mecânico. Joseph e Kars caem de um precipício na tentativa de conseguir a Pedra Vermelha.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Caesar chega ao esconderijo do inimigo, e agora ele tem um novo tipo de ataque. Lisa Lisa revela seu passado a Joseph.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Lisa Lisa e Joseph descobrem que Wamuu e Kars esperam por eles no hotel com uma centena de vampiros aliados, e ela elabora um plano inteligente para tirá-los dali.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Em uma arena antiga, Joseph e Wamuu disputam uma corrida de bigas até a morte. Mesmo escolhendo a primeira arma, Joseph se vê em uma situação perigosa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph usa a bandana de Caesar para se defender do ataque final de Wamuu. Lisa Lisa desafia Kars para um combate nas ruínas do templo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Joseph tenta impedir que Lisa Lisa sofra uma queda mortal. Speedwagon revela detalhes sobre o passado de Lisa Lisa.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: A Pedra Vermelha deixa Kars praticamente invencível. Joseph planeja atrair Kars para um vulcão e acabar com ele por lá.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Kars surge da lava derretida e ataca Joseph, que instintivamente segura a Pedra Vermelha para se proteger dos golpes do inimigo.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: O ano é 1987. Joseph vai até o Japão quando descobre que seu neto Jotaro alega estar possuído por espíritos malignos e se recusa a sair da cela.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure
programme.sub-title: O homem possuído por um espírito maligno

programme.title: Jotaro volta à vida normal, mas esconde o que Joseph chama de "Stand". A caminho da escola, o mesmo Jotaro se machuca e conhece um aluno chamado Kakyoin.
programme.desc: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure

programme.title: Police Story 2 - Codinome: Radical, (1988, Action)

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)

programme.title: Era uma vez na China e na América, (1997, Action)

programme.title: O Legado Do Grande Mestre, (2018, Action)

programme.title: Juiz Arqueiro, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um homem, que é encarregado de resolver algumas discuptas entre academinas rivais de artes marciais fica dividido. Ele não sabe se escolhe cumprir o dever do que lhe foi delegado ou se vinga a horna de sua família.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)

programme.title: Ninja, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: Casey é um garoto apaixonado pela filosofia ninja, ele o leva ao Japão para estudar Ninjutsu. Sua instrução progride e seu sensei o envia para Nova York para proteger o lendário Yoroi Bitsu, um baú blindado contendo as armas do último Ninja Koga.

programme.title: Punhos da Vingança, (2021, Action)
programme.desc: Em Xangai, um ex-campeão de artes marciais mistas e herdeiro de uma corporação multibilionária, se junta a uma informante da polícia, para investigar a morte de seu irmão assassinado em um torneio de boxe underground

programme.title: The Skull, (1965, Thriller)
programme.desc: The skull of the Marquis de Sade has been taken from its grave, bringing terror to those who own it. Demonologist Christopher Maitland is eager to add the piece to his occult collection.

programme.title: The Beast With A Million Eyes, (1955, Science fiction)
programme.desc: An unspeakable horror! Extraterrestrial terror is on the hunt for human flesh in this horrifying tale of invasion! This is a 1950s creature-feature with some serious sociological bite! Paul Birch, Lorna Thayer, and Richard Sargent star!

programme.title: Houdini, (1953, Drama)

programme.title: Cliffhanger, (1993, Action)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol 1, (2003, Action)

programme.title: Cloverfield, (2007, Science fiction)

programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: The Misfits, (1961, Western)
programme.desc: In their final screen performances, Clark Gable and Marilyn Monroe are at their luminous best as an aging cowboy and a disillusioned divorcee, each trying to adapt to new ways of life in John Huston's piercing classic. Montgomery Clift also stars.

programme.title: The Rainmaker, (1965, Drama)
programme.desc: Katharine Hepburn garnered an Oscar nomination as the "plain yet magnetically beautiful" tomboy rancher, with Burt Lancaster brilliantly cast in the role of the smooth-talking con man.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Drama)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance, (1962, Western)
programme.desc: Jimmy Stewart plays the bungling but charming big-city lawyer determined to rid the fair village of Shinbone of its number one nuisance and bad man: Liberty Valance.

programme.title: The Adventures of SharkBoy and Lavagirl, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From Robert Rodriguez, the director of the SPY KIDS franchise comes another superhero adventure for the entire family. This is the extraordinary tale of a girl with the force of a volcano who teams up with a boy raised by Great White sharks.

programme.title: The Dark Crystal, (1982, Science fiction)
programme.desc: On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and to restore order to his world.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: The Adventures of SharkBoy and Lavagirl, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: From Robert Rodriguez, the director of the SPY KIDS franchise comes another superhero adventure for the entire family. This is the extraordinary tale of a girl with the force of a volcano who teams up with a boy raised by Great White sharks.

programme.title: Push, (2009, Action)

programme.title: The Giver, (2014, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Based on the beloved young adult novel. A young man (Brenton Thwaites), who lives in a seemingly ideal world, must escape after discovering the deadly truths of his community’s secret past.

programme.title: Skyline, (2010, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jarrod and Elaine travel to Los Angeles to meet his friend Terry and his wife Candice. Terry gives a party in his apartment for Jarrod. The next morning, the group is awakened by beams of light. The group of friends try to escape from the alien invaders.

programme.title: Major League, (1989, Comedy)

programme.title: Diary of the Dead, (2007, Zombies)

programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: After two years of rigorous training, the new and improved Straw Hats make their way to Sabaody Archipelago, but their long-awaited reunion is spoiled by a villainous gang of imposters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BEGINNING OF THE NEW CHAPTER! THE STRAW HATS REUNITED!

programme.title: Luffy picks a fight with himself, Chopper falls in with a dubious crowd of imitation pirates, and Zorro causes a commotion when he falls asleep on the wrong ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: AN EXPLOSIVE SITUATION! LUFFY VS. FAKE LUFFY!

programme.title: Chopper struggles to make sense of the changes his "friends" have undergone in the last two years, and the Navy mobilizes in an attempt to stop the pirate posers. Will the real Straw Hats please stand up?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE NAVY HAS SET OUT! THE STRAW HATS IN DANGER!

programme.title: Chopper and Usopp flip over Franky's new body, Brook must choose between rock-n-roll stardom and the life of a pirate, and Luffy wanders into a very dangerous crowd!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BIG GUNS ASSEMBLED! THE DANGER OF THE FAKE STRAW HATS!

programme.title: While the rest of the Straw Hats prepare to set sail, Luffy gets a chance to show off his new powers in a brutal throw down between notorious pirates, navy soldiers, and deadly Pacifistas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IS ON! SHOW THEM WHAT YOU GOT FROM TRAINING!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew are finally reunited, but before they can set sail, they'll need help from Dark King Rayleigh, Boa Hancock, and all the friends they've made in the last two years!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVERYONE TOGETHER! LUFFY, SETTING OUT FOR THE NEW WORLD!

programme.title: As word of the Straw Hat resurrection spreads through the Navy, Luffy and his crew get acclimated to their underwater environment, and Franky reveals the startling identity of the man who protected their ship!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SURPRISING FACT! THE MAN WHO GUARDED THE SUNNY!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are attacked by a rival gang of pirates, but that may be the least of their worries. Luffy and his crew are on a collision course with a cantankerous Kraken!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: DEADLY COMBAT UNDER THE SEA! THE DEMON OF THE OCEAN STRIKES!

programme.title: After their quarrel with the Kraken, the Straw Hats find themselves in hot water as Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji turn up missing, and the rest of the crew runs short on air!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOST IN THE DEEP SEA! THE STRAW HATS GET SEPARATED!

programme.title: Thanks to a little help from a friend, Luffy saves his mates from a ghost ship captained by a deranged Dutchman! Unfortunately, their happy reunion is cut short by a volcanic eruption! Can the Hats take the heat?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: UNDERSEA VOLCANIC ERUPTION! DRIFTING TO THE FISHMAN ISLAND!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally make it to Fish-Man Island, but their reputation precedes them, leading to trouble with the New Fish-Man Pirates! Only a daring maneuver can get them out of hot water, but there's no guarantee they'll survive!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING AT THE FISHMAN ISLAND! BEAUTIFUL MERMAIDS!

programme.title: When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EXCITEMENT BLOW-OUT! SANJI'S LIFE UNDER THREAT!

programme.title: When Sanji gets up close and personal with a mesmerizing mermaid, his extreme fondness for the female form lands him in a life and death situation. Could the Straw Hat chef die from a nosebleed?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FISHMAN ISLAND WILL BE ANNIHILATED?! SHARLEY'S PROPHECY!

programme.title: After two generous donors save Sanji from death by nosebleed, Luffy and Usopp take a tour of the island. But their welcome is worn out when a mystic mermaid has a terrifying vision—that Fish-Man Island will be destroyed at the hands of a Straw Hat!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE KING OF THE FISHMAN ISLAND! NEPTUNE, THE GOD OF THE SEA!

programme.title: After reuniting with Nami, Luffy and the gang are invited to the royal palace of Neptune, god of the sea! Meanwhile, the New Fish-Man Pirates exploit the power of a designer steroid in order to terrorize humans!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE RYUGU PALACE! TAKEN BY THE SHARK THAT THEY SAVED!

programme.title: A trio of unsuspecting mermaids find themselves in hot water after releasing a bad guy from his barrel of a prison. Over at the royal palace, Luffy gets up close and personal with the Mermaid Princess!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A COWARD AND A CRYBABY! THE PRINCESS IN THE HARD SHELL TOWER!

programme.title: Luffy's lightning reflexes spare the Mermaid Princess from a grisly death, Neptune's army attempts to apprehend the Straw Hats, and Captain Vander Decken forges a sinister undersea alliance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: IT'S AN EMERGENCY! THE RYUGU PALACE IS OCCUPIED!

programme.title: With their backs against the wall, the Straw Hats are forced to take King Neptune and his men hostage. On the other side of the palace, Luffy and the Mermaid Princess make plans to visit the Sea Forrest!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE RYUGU PALACE IN SHOCK! THE KIDNAPPING OF SHIRAHOSHI!

programme.title: Luffy accidentally "kidnaps" the Mermaid Princess, an old friend issues a grave warning to Chopper and Sanji, and the New Fish-Man Pirates prepare for a raid on Ryugu Palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HORDY'S ONSLAUGHT! THE RETALIATORY PLAN SET INTO MOTION!

programme.title: Captain Vander Decken and Hordy Jones manage to successfully breach the defenses of Ryugu Palace. Meanwhile, Jimbei waits patiently for Luffy to arrive at the Sea Forest.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE BATTLE IN RYUGU PALACE! ZORO VS. HORDY!

programme.title: Robin ventures into the forest in search of ancient secrets, Zoro takes to the water for a slicing, dicing showdown with Hordy Jones, and Luffy is branded a royal kidnapper by an angry mob of fish folk!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KEEP SHIRAHOSHI SAFE! DECKEN CLOSE BEHIND!

programme.title: Luffy, Chopper, and Sanji are taken prisoner by a fish mob just as Vander Decken launches an attack the princess! Elsewhere, Zoro continues his battle with Hordy, and Nami hitches a ride on a mermaid to escape the crumbling palace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRAW HATS DEFEATED?! HORDY GAINS CONTROL OF THE RYUGU PALACE!

programme.title: Zoro and Neptune fight bravely, but they're no match for Hordy and his pill-popping minions. Back at the ship, Luffy reunites with Jimbei, who reveals something sinister about his past.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE HAUNTING TIES! NAMI AND THE FISHMAN PIRATES!

programme.title: The New Fish-Man Pirates continue their bloody and violent uprising, and Jimbei begins the story of how he unleashed the monster known as Arlong on the unsuspecting citizens of the East Blue.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A HERO WHO FREED THE SLAVES! AN ADVENTURER TIGER!

programme.title: Jimbei continues his story with tales of fish-men taken as slaves, Queen Otohime's fierce devotion to her people, the legend of Fisher Tiger, and the sinister rise of Arlong.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: KIZARU APPEARS! A TRAP TO CATCH TIGER!

programme.title: Arlong's violent tendencies are condemned by Fisher Tiger, and the arrival of a young human girl teaches the Fish-Man Pirates a lesson in compassion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Team is Formed! Save Chopper

programme.title: The great pirate Fisher Tiger keeps his promise to a young slave girl, but the adults in her village are determined to make him pay for his act of honor.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE DEATH OF THE HERO! A SHOCKING TRUTH OF TIGER!

programme.title: In the wake of Fisher Tiger's tragic death, the once-mighty Sun Pirates are splintered by an ongoing quarrel between Jimbei and Arlong. Meanwhile, Queen Otohime's ceasless quest to help her people begins to take its toll.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SUN PIRATES SPLIT! JIMBEI VS. ARLONG!

programme.title: Tensions run high when a slave-owning Celestial Dragon washes up on Fish-Man Island. His former captives cry for out for blood, but Queen Otohime sees it as a chance to mend fences between the gilled and non-gilled!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SHAKING FISHMAN ISLAND! A CELESTIAL DRAGON DRIFTS IN!

programme.title: After an agonizing absence, Queen Otohime returns to her people with exciting news. Unfortunately, a horrific act of violence derails the queen's mission and changes life on Fish-Man Island forever.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SUDDEN TRAGEDY! A GUNSHOT SHUTS DOWN THE FUTURE!

programme.title: Jimbei reaches the heartbreaking conclusion in the story of Queen Otohime, Nami does something completely unexpected, and Hordy Jones makes a foreboding appearance!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BACK TO THE PRESENT! HORDY MAKES A MOVE!

programme.title: Hordy announces his sinister plans for Fish-Man Island. Luffy and Shirahoshi are ready to fight, but Jimbei wants to wage this war on his own!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE KINGDOM IN SHOCK! AN ORDER TO EXECUTE NEPTUNE ISSUED!

programme.title: Luffy and Jimbei come to blows over how to handle Hordy's uprising. Back at the palace, Brook embarks on an out-of-body experience with hopes of saving his mates!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A RIFT OPENS UP! LUFFY VS. JIMBEI!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin learns he needs a pure-hearted girl to find an ancient Persian treasure and his computer chooses a girl named Lori. After getting some hands-on training from Jigen and Goemon, the two are headed to Jordan to find the treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Golden Apple, known as "Eve's Apple" is being transported to New York City on board a luxury cruise ship and Inspector Zenigata has a gut feeling Lupin is after it. Inspector Zenigata's hunch is on the mark as Lupin and Jigen are onboard the ship.
programme.sub-title: A Golden Apple Has Its Poison

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon when Fujiko promises to marry him if he steals the ICPO's gold for her. Lupin pulls off the heist right under Inspector Zenigata's nose, but the two soon find themselves locked up in jail.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: It's the Mafia Boss' birthday party and everyone is gambling away. Lupin's next target is the casino's safe. While attending the party, Lupin meets a girl named Jenny, who is willing to help him pull off the heist to sell her name.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin breaks out a man named Parker from a Mexican prison in order to steal the treasure Parker had hidden away somewhere.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin, who was once duped by Mamushidayu into stealing diamonds, decides its payback time. Will Lupin get his revenge and finally get his share of diamonds after all?
programme.sub-title: The Man Who Erased His Past

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: An ancient burial mound has been discovered and etched on its walls are ancient mythical creatures with jewel-encrusted eyes. Lupin makes off with the blue dragon's crystal eye and kidnaps the archeologist in charge.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang break into a vault full of uncut diamonds. However, the diamonds suddenly catch on fire, and guess who is being blamed for it!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The Swiss Bank's Beirut branch is a mobile branch. Will Lupin manage to pull off the heist of this impenetrable bank and get out safely with Inspector Zenigata on his tail?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are after Taniyama's treasure from an ancient Chinese dynasty. Realizing that Lupin is after his treasure, Taniyama hires a lone assassin named Seiryuu to counter Goemon.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: How could Lupin and his gang refuse when a church priest asks them to retrieve the Dove's Eggs, the church's jewels, for the sake of Spoonland's children?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang are in New York City to steal a pinball machine made of solid gold. Lupin, Jigen, and Fujiko board a casino cruise ship and discover that they'll need Goemon's Zantetsuken sword to pull off the heist.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were pursuing Flight 107 when Soviet Union planes suddenly shoot it down for wandering into its territory inadvertently.
programme.sub-title: Code Name is The Star of Alaska

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A ring called the Star of Alaska holds a single wheat seed inside it. The seed is a new species of wheat that can grow in minus 40 degrees and the CIA and KGB are determined to get their hands on it.
programme.sub-title: The Star of Alaska Is a Ticket to Hell

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin is over the moon, now that he's won Fujiko's hand in marriage after stealing Marie Antoinette's wedding dress and ring.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A massive amount of gold is being transported in the cover of darkness, but on this rainy night, Lupin is busy being a bartender to a beautiful woman named Sara.
programme.sub-title: The Name of the Cocktail Is Revenge

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal an exquisite painting of a young girl from a Renoir art exhibit. Using the painting as bait, Lupin and his gang plan to steal Ghellon's impressive art collection.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: John Decker, an oil tycoon from Colorado hires Lupin to steal the US presidential limousine and promises to pay 10 million dollars in return.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang were scoping out their next target, Macintosh Jewelry, the world's most expensive jewelry store when they end up inadvertently saving a young boy who was being kidnapped.
programme.sub-title: Boy Genius Plays a Dangerous Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang make off with the New York Mafia's secret cash hoard. However, the suitcases were filled with old newspapers and as retribution, the mafia puts a hefty bounty on Lupin's head.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang blow up Fontaubert Bank's underground safe to steal 5 tons worth of gold, but someone has beaten them to it. The thieves are a pair of disguise artists named John and Mary.
programme.sub-title: The Target Beyond the Snowy Field

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Eagle of Helazard from a luxury cruise ship, but Fujiko betrays them at the last moment and makes off with the Eagle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata is even more determined to capture Lupin after an incident with Anne. Lupin and his gang will soon learn that Inspector Zenigata is a force to be reckoned with when he's raging mad.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon has been thrown into prison for a crime he did not commit. He is charged with cutting off the Little Mermaid's arm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: A mysterious army steals 3 tons worth of gold under Inspector Zenigata's watch. His superiors are convinced Lupin stole the gold and holds Inspector Zenigata responsible.
programme.sub-title: Give the Gold to My Rival

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin has lottery fever, or to be specific, has his eyes set on the 50 million dollar jackpot. However, Lupin discovers the lottery is rigged.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have learned a coup d'état is about to take place in one of the Caribbean countries. Amidst the chaos, they plan to steal the dictator's treasure.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Count Bone and Lord Wave operate the Rondo Insurance Company. The two seem like perfect English gentlemen, but they make their money through dirty tactics.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Cyborg, (1989, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Jean-Claude Van Damme stars in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi thriller as Gibson Rickenbacker, the future's most fearsome warrior. In the wake of a plague, Rickenbacker must rescue the only person who can develop a vaccine and save civilization.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days, (2010, Zombies)
programme.desc: Almost a year has passed since Barrow, Alaska’s population was decimated by vampires. Stella, mourning her husband’s murder, has been travelling the world trying to convince others that vampires exist.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: Underworld, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the Underworld, Vampires are a secret clan of modern aristocratic sophisticates whose mortal enemies are the Lycans (werewolves), a shrewd gang of street thugs who prowl the city's underbelly.

programme.title: Underworld: Evolution, (2006, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: Vampire death dealer, Selene (Kate Beckinsale) fights to end the eternal war between the Lycan clan and the Vampire faction that betrayed her.

programme.title: Underworld Awakening, (2011, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrioress Selene leads the battle against humankind.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars, (2016, Blockbusters)
programme.desc: As the war between the Death Dealers and the Lycans rages on, Selene (Beckinsale), the vampire warrior, and Michael (Speedman), the werewolf hybrid, work together in an effort to unlock the secrets of their respective bloodlines.

programme.title: Ultraviolet, (2006, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich, Cameron Bright Nick Chinlund and William Fichtner star in this theatrical set in the late 21st century, where some humans have been modified genetically by a vampire-like disease and the world is pushed to the brink of worldwide civil war.

programme.title: Cowboy and the Senorita, (1944, Western)
programme.desc: A worthless gold mine might in fact have hidden gold deposits. Leave it to Roy to find out the truth!

programme.title: Sabata, (1969, Western)
programme.desc: Get ready for fast-paced, explosive action as Lee Van Cleef stars as Sabata, the mysterious, steely-eyed gunslinger who, after he discovers the masterminds behind an elaborate bank heist, imposes his bullet-laced brand of justice on a guilty town.

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Western)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: Paint Your Wagon, (1970, Western)
programme.desc: A Michigan farmer and a prospector form a partnership in the California gold country. Their adventures include buying and sharing a wife...

programme.title: Stagecoach, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Dallas is a woman with a past who has been driven out of town by the high-minded ladies of the community. Lucy Mallory is the wife of a cavalry officer stationed in Lordsburg, and she's determined to be with him.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
